reason: The dominant headline 'As the market tanks, crypto’s new gold rush is…gold' strongly indicates a risk-off environment, with capital flowing out of crypto into traditional safe-havens, signaling an active Markdown phase. This sentiment is reinforced by Vitalik Buterin's warning regarding deep flaws in decentralized stablecoins, adding systemic risk to the DeFi sector. While news of Robinhood building an Ethereum Layer-2 and the emphasis on zero-knowledge proofs for Ethereum's future are fundamentally positive for long-term adoption and scalability, they do not negate the immediate bearish pressure and heightened risk. Investors should exercise extreme caution as the market seeks a new support level amidst ongoing selling pressure and uncertainty.
headlines: Walmart and Google bet on AI agents to reshape how people shop online
As the market tanks, crypto’s new gold rush is…gold
Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin warns decentralized stablecoins still have deep flaws
Ethereum’s future hinges on zero-knowledge proofs, EF director says
Robinhood explains building an Ethereum layer-2: 'We wanted the security from Ethereum'
